subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han simp|穪|f=爾|t=尔}}, where {{lang|zh|穪}} is corrupted from {{lang|zh|稱}}. It was found in various {{w|Movable type#Metal movable type in China|moveable type}} copies of {{w|Classic Chinese Novels|classical novels}}. First attested in 《{{w2|zh|宋元以來俗字譜}}》, a {{w|Variant Chinese character|variant forms}} dictionary compiled in 1930 that records unorthodox forms ({{l|zh|俗字}}) that have existed since the {{w|Song dynasty}}.

Adopted as an official simplified character by the People's Republic of China in the 1956 {{w|Chinese Character Simplification Scheme}}. <!-- Refer https://zh.wikisource.org/wiki/漢字簡化方案 -->
